description: Try our easy to follow Chick Pea Burger Patties recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chick Pea Burger Patties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and pepper. Mix and form into 4 patties. Note: You can use bought breadcrumbs to crumb foods, but if you have a food processor it's easy to make your own. Remove the crusts from day-old white bread slices and cut into cubes. Transfer the cubes to the bowl of a food processor and process until finely chopped.
